snippet: In Europe, where many take a critical view of Israel's policies in the Middle East, commentators have expressed doubts as well as alarm at what some describe as a game of bluff over a possible strike against Iran.
abstract: In Europe, where many take a critical view of Israel's policies in the Middle East, commentators have expressed doubts as well as alarm at what some describe as a game of bluff over a possible strike against Iran.

headline.main: Europeans Skeptical of Israeli War Talk
